src:
NAVIJAČI „VUČICE“ ĆE BITI BESNI: Milan krade Romi već dogovoreno pojačanje!
06 Nov 2019, 16:06 by Marko
Paolo Maldini i Zvonimir Boban su u potrazi za adekvatnim pojačanjima koja bi mogla da izvuku „rosonere“ iz krize u kojoj se nalaze.
Milan igra katasrofalno. Ni promena trenera nije donela previše dobrog u redovima sedmostrukog prvaka Evrope, a uprava kluba želi u svojim redovima da vidi igrača koji u novoj sezoni igra kao preporođen.
Kris Smoling je došao iz Mančester junajteda u Romu ovog leta. Čelnici „vučice“ su više nego zadovoljni njegovim partijama, pa su stupili u kontakt sa „crvenim đavolima“ kako bi otkupili njegov ugovor.
Međutim, u trku se umešao i Milan, koji po svaku cenu želi da pojača defanzivu.
Podsetimo, Roma je za pozajmicu engleskog reprezentativca platila Mančester junajtedu tri miliona evra.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
WITHDRAWALS FANS WILL BE ABLE: Milan steals Roma already agreed reinforcement!
06 Nov 2019, 15:06 by Marko
Paolo Maldini and Zvonimir Boban are looking for adequate reinforcements that could pull the "rosons" out of the crisis they are in.
Milan plays catastrophically. The change of coach has not brought too much good in the seven-time European champions, and the club management wants to see in its ranks a player who is playing as a rebirth in the new season.
Chris Smalling came from Manchester United in Roma this summer. The wolf leaders are more than pleased with his parties, so they contacted the Red Devils to buy his contract.
However, Milan also intervened in the race, which wants to boost the defense at all costs.
Roma have paid Manchester United three million euros to loan the English national team.
